speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: SCENE V. Another room in Philario's house.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Enter POSTHUMUS LEONATUS

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Is there no way for men to be but women

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Must be half-workers? We are all bastards;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And that most venerable man which I

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Did call my father, was I know not where

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: When I was stamp'd; some coiner with his tools

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Made me a counterfeit: yet my mother seem'd

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The Dian of that time so doth my wife

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The nonpareil of this. O, vengeance, vengeance!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Me of my lawful pleasure she restrain'd

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And pray'd me oft forbearance; did it with

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: A pudency so rosy the sweet view on't

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Might well have warm'd old Saturn; that I thought her

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: As chaste as unsunn'd snow. O, all the devils!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: This yellow Iachimo, in an hour,--wast not?--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Or less,--at first?--perchance he spoke not, but,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Like a full-acorn'd boar, a German one,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Cried 'O!' and mounted; found no opposition

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But what he look'd for should oppose and she

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Should from encounter guard. Could I find out

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The woman's part in me! For there's no motion

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That tends to vice in man, but I affirm

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: It is the woman's part: be it lying, note it,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The woman's; flattering, hers; deceiving, hers;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Lust and rank thoughts, hers, hers; revenges, hers;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Ambitions, covetings, change of prides, disdain,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Nice longing, slanders, mutability,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: All faults that may be named, nay, that hell knows,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Why, hers, in part or all; but rather, all;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: For even to vice

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: They are not constant but are changing still

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: One vice, but of a minute old, for one

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Not half so old as that. I'll write against them,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Detest them, curse them: yet 'tis greater skill

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: In a true hate, to pray they have their will:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The very devils cannot plague them better.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Exit
